title: Jessie J shares sweet selfies with handsome beau Channing Tatum on romantic date
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Jessie J and Channing Tatum looked more loved-up than ever in a series of smitten selfies posted to Instagram .

Singing sensation Jessie J, 31, took to social media to tease a glimpse of her romantic day date with her charming beau Channing Tatum, 39.

She shared a stunning black-and-white snap of herself posing with the Magic Mike star in front of the Pacific Park ferris wheel in Santa Monica, California.

The famous couple, who have been dating since October 2018, enjoyed a romantic and very public day out along the beachfront.

(Image: Instagram)

The Voice Kids coach styled her raven locks up in a sleek up-do and kept her hair off her face with stylish aviator shades.

Channing attempted to stay low-key in a casual fashion ensemble which featured a white T-shirt, baggy jeans and a Brixton Company baseball cap.

In another snap, Jessie and her Magic Mike star boyfriend could be seen going on a beachfront bike ride while she captioned it with: "My seat is too low".

(Image: Instagram)

In another photo, Jessie posted a sweet pic of Channing with his arm romantically wrapped around her as they cosied together for a stroll.

The couple's day out comes after Channing's ex-wife Jenna Dewan , 38, opened up about their former relationship and confessed her husband's new relationship 'blindsighted her'.

In her new wellness book, Gracefully You: Finding Beauty And Balance In The Everyday , Jenna admitted his romance with Jessie J came as a shock.

According to Radar Online , the actress wrote: "There I was, on a plane, alone, finding out about his new relationship. I felt blindsided."

(Image: Instagram)

It is the first time that Jenna has gone into details about why her marriage fell apart before announcing they had separated in April 2018.

Jenna, who has six-year-old daughter Everly with Channing, revealed that they decided to separate on the eve of her filming the second season of World of Dance.

Jenna and Channing are certainly moving on since his break up, with Jessie posting a number of PDA-filled pics on social media recently.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: WireImage)

Channing first started dating the British hitmaker a year ago, and their relationship has gone from strength to strength, with Jessie recently meeting his daughter Everly, six.

Jenna and Channing met on the set of Set Up and the pair were married on July 11, 2009, with Everly being born in May 2013.

They ended their marriage when they released a joint statement on April 2, 2018.
description: The loved-up couple captured their romantic day date along the beachfront with some romantic snaps
